pages.text: Thrinaxodon is a cynodont that lived just after the P-T mass extincation event. Its survival was likely due to its burrowing habit. It displayed a sprawling posture and it was medium sized, possibly covered in hair and was carnivorous. There is also a famous specimen discovered in a burrow together with a Broomistega.
$(l)Eats:$() Meat$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Bug Meat$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Nested Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Find Egg in Nest
